EmailTemplate.name: Legend Boats 2016 Catalogue
EmailTemplate.subject: Legend Boats 2016 Catalogue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Account.FirstName},
Good news! Our 2016 Legend Boats Catalogue is available for free download on our website! We're very excited to share all of our new boat and pontoon models with you, as well as all of the information about our company you could want.
Please visit legendboats.com and scroll down just a bit until you see the area to enter your name and email. Once you've entered your information, click GET YOUR CATALOGUE and you're good to go!
If you have any questions regarding our catalogue, our boats, our Mission, our All In Pricing or anything else you can think of, please feel free to get in touch!
Thanks for your time and we hope you enjoy your new reading material.
Yours in Boating,
All of us here at Legend Boats!
